channel.title: Please Lock
channel.description:
Wasted my time trying to get noobs to do work for something.
Sorry if I got your hopes up, but your not getting any emotes out of me...
Except for this one...FUCK YOU LEECH NOOBS.

item.title: Please Lock
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

u can’t just split the .dat file
seriously that doesn’t even make sense, you would have to recreate it and claim it to be the original but in 2 parts

your better off making some shitty custom emote that’ll fit the gfx instead of attempting to split the emote into 2, its inefficient, may as well just fix it 2 load 474 cache

Read full topic

item.title: Please Lock
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

[quote=“Superd00d, post:15, topic:331917”][quote author=wolfs goal link=topic=428293.msg3145741#msg3145741 date=1268022340]

Prove it.

I am, like I said, I’m trying to get the GFX for the strength emote to work properly…I have the model for the GFX already, it starts to lift then turns you invisible…so I’m going to need to work on the GFX for a bit longer…

And yeah, you can split a .dat file retard…I haven’t gotten that dumbass 86 error in a while, last time I got it was when i split the .dat file into 2 files and forgot to change the 1290 to 8000, thus it couldn’t find the file…

So stop using someones leeched client and maybe if you get a .dat decoder you can split the file as well…
[/quote]
Good luck. Dont mind the noobs flaming, they just want post :)[/quote]

I give up on this…I give them the concept of splitting the .dat file…I give them the strength emote code…They only want me to give them something that they are going to leech…

I don’t care what people say…Getting topic locked so it can die…

Read full topic

I am, like I said, I’m trying to get the GFX for the strength emote to work properly…I have the model for the GFX already, it starts to lift then turns you invisible…so I’m going to need to work on the GFX for a bit longer…

And yeah, you can split a .dat file retard…I haven’t gotten that dumbass 86 error in a while, last time I got it was when i split the .dat file into 2 files and forgot to change the 1290 to 8000, thus it couldn’t find the file…

So stop using someones leeched client and maybe if you get a .dat decoder you can split the file as well…[/quote]
Good luck. Dont mind the noobs flaming, they just want post

Prove it.

I am, like I said, I’m trying to get the GFX for the strength emote to work properly…I have the model for the GFX already, it starts to lift then turns you invisible…so I’m going to need to work on the GFX for a bit longer…

And yeah, you can split a .dat file retard…I haven’t gotten that dumbass 86 error in a while, last time I got it was when i split the .dat file into 2 files and forgot to change the 1290 to 8000, thus it couldn’t find the file…

item.title: Please Lock
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“wolfs goal, post:5, topic:331917”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=428293.msg3145189#msg3145189 date=1267986861]
Lets show some proof. I don’t believe you at all.

Please show that it is a 317 client also.
[/quote]

Gimme a few mins or hours, I’m putting the skillcape GFX’s in atm…

P.S. I know you only want the proof so you can jack off to how tight it is…[/quote]

I can tell your lying, because you have no idea how to even load it.
To correctly get it to load, you have to load it through your cache and make several 317 limitations the client has.

If you tried it this way, you’ll get config error 86 (kinda sleepy its 26 or 86)

Also, its taken you so long to receive simple proof, so i guarantee you can’t do this.

Read full topic
